entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get localization lcl translations handback working #26176
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Add new templates to localization #26175
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Fancy Sample Code Uses Copyrighted Fonts #26173
  • Add Localization Tests #26172
    Backlog
  • CarouselView iOS crash when swiping to 2nd carousel page - Index was out of range / System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26171
  • [iOS] Investigate if MauiCALayer needs to use a weakreference for the IShape #26169
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync(string) throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException on Android 14 #26167
  • InitializeComponent throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException #26166
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar overrides tabbar title with page title. #26165
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar does not work on iOS with more than 5 tabs #26164
  • Update System.Formats.Asn1 #26162
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Not rendering ImageButton Stroke #26159
  • SelectionLength Property Not Applied to Entry at Runtime #26158
  • Button sizing broken by .NET9 when using the Mac UI Idiom #26154
  • Label display bug #26151
  • CollectionView GroupHeaderTemplate controls inside incorrectly show/hide after reusing dataTemplate #26150
  • The Shell FlyoutIcon foreground color is not applied on the Windows platform. #26148
  • HttpClient GET Api is failing with {System.IO.IOException: Connection reset ---> Java.Net.SocketException: Connection reset error in .NET MAUI Android #26147
  • Navigation - Shell TabBar Doesnt render Content when navigating from and then back to it #26144

Closed

  • [Android] [Maps] Fatal exception after pushing modal page to navigation stack #20187
    Backlog
  • Android Crash ImageSource Glyph #26156
  • [.NET 9] Shell Flyout menu not rendering after navigating from a MenuItem page #25436
    .NET 9 SR2
  • PointerGestureRecognizer is not working at all on droid #26149
  • [IOS] Dotnet 9 Memory leaks: BindableLayout leaks if nested inside a CollectionView, CarouselView ...etc #26042
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [NET9] iOS Run Templates on NET9 are failing #24236
    .NET 9 SR2
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly if set through Binding #22607
    Backlog
  • Binding Context on Content View #14919
    Backlog
  • BindingContext Not Propagated Correctly to ContentView When ControlTemplate Changes at Runtime #25934
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Content Page Can Not Extend Edge To Fullscreen When Using Translucent NavigationBar #15989

PullRequests

Created

  • Add three templates to locproject.json #26178
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Change Yaml to use OneLocTool to create PR after we receive the lcl files #26177
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10628913 #26174
  • [ci] See if we can provision by default on devdiv #26170
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 21 #26168
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [nuget] Update System.Formats.Asn1 #26163
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added tests to validate the ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property in CarouselView #26160
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed CollectionViewHandler2 null reference exception if ItemsLayout is set for Tablet but NOT Phone #26152
    community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Make MauiAppCompatEditText public #26146
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Tweener leak on Animation #26143
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 20 #26142
    area-testing, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Make sure to unsubscribe from LayoutChanged on CV #26138
    .NET 9 SR1.2
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] Make sure to unsubscribe from LayoutChanged on CV #26139

Updated

  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml, p/0, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Reseting thumb image #26085
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • [Testing] Fix randomly failing tests on CI #26120
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    area-single-project, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for DatePicker displays incorrect date selection when navigating to next month. #26064
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right end #25825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added ToggleSystemAnimations method to Appium helper methods #26096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix crash setting MenuFlyoutSubItem IconImageSource #26021
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, area-controls-flyout, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 19 #26100
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #26051
    area-animation, area-drawing, community ✨
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix ShellContent Title Does Not Update at Runtime #26062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [Windows] - Fix for Shell Section Visibility changes not reflected until Tab switch #26130
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • TableView title issue fix on windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR3
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR3
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
